Regression Task

Source: R/TaskRegr.R

This task specializes Task and TaskSupervised for regression problems. The target column is assumed to be numeric.

Format

R6Class object inheriting from Task/TaskSupervised.

Usage

Inherits from Task/TaskSupervised.

t = TaskRegr$new(id, backend, target)

Details

$task_type is "regr".

See also

Other Task: TaskClassif, TaskSupervised, Task, mlr_task_generators, mlr_tasks

Examples

b = as_data_backend(iris)
task = TaskRegr$new("iris", backend = b, target = "Sepal.Length")
task$task_type
#> [1] "regr"
task$formula
#> Sepal.Length ~ Petal.Length + Petal.Width + Sepal.Width + Species
#> NULL
task$truth()
#>   [1] 5.1 4.9 4.7 4.6 5.0 5.4 4.6 5.0 4.4 4.9 5.4 4.8 4.8 4.3 5.8 5.7 5.4 5.1
#>  [19] 5.7 5.1 5.4 5.1 4.6 5.1 4.8 5.0 5.0 5.2 5.2 4.7 4.8 5.4 5.2 5.5 4.9 5.0
#>  [37] 5.5 4.9 4.4 5.1 5.0 4.5 4.4 5.0 5.1 4.8 5.1 4.6 5.3 5.0 7.0 6.4 6.9 5.5
#>  [55] 6.5 5.7 6.3 4.9 6.6 5.2 5.0 5.9 6.0 6.1 5.6 6.7 5.6 5.8 6.2 5.6 5.9 6.1
#>  [73] 6.3 6.1 6.4 6.6 6.8 6.7 6.0 5.7 5.5 5.5 5.8 6.0 5.4 6.0 6.7 6.3 5.6 5.5
